name: facet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one part of a subject, situation, etc. that has many parts: She has so many facets to her personality. Synonyms
angle (WAY OF THINKING)
aspect (FEATURE)
feature (QUALITY)
ingredient
point (CHARACTERISTIC)
side (PART OF SITUATION)
strand (PART)
one of the small flat surfaces cut on a precious stone
medical
  specialized a flat surface on a bone or tooth, either occurring naturally or caused by continued use: Injured or painful facet joints can be injected with steroids.
